enb_long_title: SIXTH CONFERENCE OF THE PARTIES TO THE UN FRAMEWORK CONVENTION ON CLIMATE CHANGE RESUMED SESSION
sentences: Delegates met in a contact group convened under the SBI to consider the programme budget for the biennium 2002-2003.

Participants engaged in a question-and-answer session on various aspects of the programme budget, including: staffing requirements; geographic representation of staff; the overall funding increase being proposed; and the impact of decisions by the COP on the work programme.
Delegates also discussed spending priorities, with developing countries highlighting technology transfer as one of the key areas.
